Description Give your personal style the time it deserves with this pocket watch from the STRADA Japanese movement collection. Eye-catching coloring and enchanting design dotted with lapis lazuli, mother of pearl, South African tigers eye Interchangeable case backs makes this versatile ticker fun and functional. Discover an easy-going finish to casual looks, a classy accent to smart attire or both!
